dc:title: Father Milani R. I. P.
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Mourns the death of Don Lorenzo Milani, an Italian parish priest who was a staunch defender of conscientious objection to war for Italians.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 854 1967-07-01 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
